function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low humidity affecting UVGI system effectiveness","Impact":"Reduced ability to kill or inactivate airborne bacteria","Mitigation":"Conduct additional research on the effects of low RH and develop guidelines for maintaining optimal humidity levels","Technologies":"UVGI systems, humidity control systems","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of standardized testing for UVGI effectiveness","Impact":"Inconsistent results and unreliable efficacy of UVGI systems","Mitigation":"Develop standardized testing guidelines for UVGI sensitivity and efficacy, as well as protocols for testing and validating UVGI systems","Technologies":"Standardization protocols for UVGI testing","People":"Laboratories, researchers, manufacturers","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of UVGI systems in real-world conditions","Impact":"Decreased effectiveness of UVGI on potentially infectious droplet nuclei","Mitigation":"Conduct experiments to evaluate UVGI effectiveness in real-world conditions and develop guidelines for practical installation of UVGI systems","Technologies":"CFD modeling, experimental testing, temperature control systems","People":"Building owners, facility managers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
